attributes.action: Stop the abuse faced by self employed Hermes couriers.
attributes.additional_details:
Hermes pays a per drop small fee without any inconvenience allowances .3 attempts to deliver if the customer is unavailable without storage allowance. No compensation (part or whole) for business insurance if couriers obtain it personally.Lack of monitoring of Sub - Depot controllers who distribute parcels and often abuse . Next catalogues are sent to couriers home address instead of Sub - Depot.
No compensation for physical abuse by pets whilst delivering parcels through letterbox.
attributes.background: This petition is created to stop the abuse which Hermes couriers face when they are out on deliveries.Hermes pay a per drop small fee without any inconvenience allowances and lack of monitoring of Sub- Depot controllers who operate partially.
